## ForwardRequestMessage type

Forward Request Message that's used for gasless transaction

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type ForwardRequestMessage = {
    from: string;
    to: string;
    value: string;
    gas: string;
    nonce: string;
    data: BytesLike;
};
```
